text.0: o vĀyu drinker of the pure be near us a thousand teams are thine allbounteous giver.
text.1: to thee the rapturebringing juice is offered whose first draught god thou takest as thy portion.
text.2: prompt at the holy rites forth came the presser with somadraughts for indra and for vāyu.
text.3: when ministering priests with strong devotion bring to you twain the first taste of the soma.
text.4: the teams wherewith thou seekest him who offers within his home o viyu to direct him.
text.5: therewith send wealth to us with full enjoyment a hero son and gifts of kine and horses.
text.6: near to the gods and making indra joyful devout and offering precious gifts to vāyu.
text.7: allied with princes smiting down the hostile may we with heroes conquer foes in battle.
text.8: with thy yoked teams in hundreds and in thousands come to our sacrifice and solemn worship.
text.9: come vāyu make thee glad at this libation preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
